record.description: [William V. Kahler, president of the Western Society of Engineers, and Britton I. Budd, Crerar Library board chairman, signing contracts for the creation of the Engineering and Science Center. Standing, left to right: Herman H. Henkle, G. R. Jones, C. B. Borland, D. V. Steger, F. A. Rogers, H. P. Sedwick, J. F. Damman, and E. G. Fox.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Photographer's stamp.A separate news article from the Bulletin of Western Society of Engineers, December 25, 1947 is included in the file.
